Window_IsZoomed Property

CDXML Name:WindowIsZoomed
CDX Constant Name:kCDXProp_Window_IsZoomed
CDX Constant Value:0x0900
Data Size:CDXBooleanImplied
Property of objects:kCDXObj_Document
First written/read in:ChemDraw 4.0
Required?No

Description:

Signifies whether the main viewing window is zoomed (maximized).

If this property is absent:

The window is not zoomed (maximized)
